participant_1.background:
I wake up early to get a head start on my day.
i am married and have three kids.
I remember listening to my parents play music together when I was young.
I want to be in good shape for my cosplay at Comic Con, so I try to exercise every day.
I am passionate about being a good dog parent to my collie.

participant_2.background:
I'm interested in trying new things and expanding my horizons.
my father is a preacher.
i wish my boyfriend did not want an open relationship.
i eat junk food.
i love sweets.

content.text: Hi! I'm a father of 3, my favorite hobby is cosplaying!  What are you interested in?
Hi! I'm interested in trying new things and expanding my horizons, what do you like to do?
I love trying new things too! I love to try new foods and travel.  I also love music, my parents played music together when I was young and it really inspired me.
That's awesome! I love music too, I play the drums.  My father is a preacher, so I grew up in church and love the music there.
That's so cool! I've always wanted to learn to play an instrument.  What kind of music do you like to play?
I love to play gospel and worship music.  I also love funk and rock music.
Wow, that's a lot of different genres!  I mostly like rock and roll, but I'll listen to just about anything.
Me too! I'm always open to new music.  What are some of your favorite bands?
I love The Beatles, Guns N' Roses, and The Rolling Stones.  What about you?
I love all of those bands!  My favorite bands are The Beatles, Queen, and U2.
Wow, we have a lot in common!  It's nice to meet you!
You too!  I'm glad we have something in common.
